short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize and keep track of online links and resources with this handy-dandy extension, all set with a simple and easy interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ClipNote eliminates the need for a cluttered bookmarks folder with confusing names and descriptions. Keep track of up to three projects, with unlimited links in each; adding and deleting links and tags as you please!

Simply click on the extension and save your current tab under a chosen name. Then add as many little notes as you'd like to describe the resource for future you. Whenever you want to retrieve a saved link or resource, just identify it by the notes you've added, and then click on the name you've saved it under to open it in a new tab. It's that easy!
